title: Faster, lighter: Ford's GT Competition Series detailed - Roadshow
text:
Faster, lighter: Ford's GT Competition Series detailed Ford GT Competition Series 
Ford GT Competition Series offers weight-savings, such as lightweight, race-inspired Perspex acrylic engine hatch cover and a bulkhead made of Gorilla Glass. Photo by: Ford Motor Co. Ford GT Competition Series
